parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.32

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Vehicle Inventory

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Adds magazines with specified ammo count to the cargo space of a vehicle or a container.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> cargospace [[addMagazineAmmoCargo]] [magazine, quantity, ammocount]

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> cargospace: [[Object]] - vehicle or container or weaponholder

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> [magazine, quantity, ammocount]: [[Array]]

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> magazine: [[String]] - magazine class name

</value></part><part><name>p4</name>=<value> quantity: [[Number]] - number of magazines to add

</value></part><part><name>p5</name>=<value> ammocount: [[Number]] - ammo count in each magazine

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_ammobox [[addMagazineAmmoCargo]] ["30Rnd_65x39_caseless_mag", 2, 5];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[magazinesAmmoCargo]], [[addMagazineCargo]], [[addMagazineGlobal]], [[addMagazine]], [[addMagazines]], [[addMagazinePool]], [[addMagazineTurret]], [[clearMagazineCargo]], [[addWeaponCargo]], [[clearWeaponCargo]], [[clearWeaponCargo]], [[addWeaponCargoGlobal]], [[addBackpackCargoGlobal]], [[addItemCargo]], [[addItemCargoGlobal]]
</value></part></template>



[[Category:Scripting Commands|<template><title>uc:<template><title>PAGENAME</title></template></title></template>]]
<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template></root>
